description: Contains detailed information about each GitHub repository, including metadata, ownership, and configuration details.

foreign_keys.owner_id: Links to the 'id' in the Users stream (Owner of the repository).

id.description: The unique identifier for the repository.

node_id.description: A node-specific identifier for the repository.

full_name.description: The full name of the repository including the owner's name.

owner.description: An object containing information about the repository owner.

private.description: Indicates whether the repository is private.

html_url.description: The URL of the repository on GitHub's web interface.

description.description: A brief description of the repository's purpose and contents.

fork.description: Indicates whether the repository is a fork of another repository.

url.description: The API URL of the repository.

archive_url.description: The URL to download a tar archive of the repository.

assignees_url.description: The URL listing the assignees for issues in the repository.

blobs_url.description: The URL for blobs (binary large objects) in the repository.

branches_url.description: The URL listing the branches in the repository.

collaborators_url.description: The URL listing the collaborators of the repository.

comments_url.description: The URL for comments in the repository's issues and pull requests.

commits_url.description: The URL listing the commits in the repository.

compare_url.description: The URL to compare two commits in the repository.

contents_url.description: The URL to retrieve the contents of the repository.

contributors_url.description: The URL listing the contributors to the repository.

deployments_url.description: The URL listing the deployments of the repository.

downloads_url.description: The URL for downloading resources from the repository.

events_url.description: The URL listing the events in the repository.

forks_url.description: The URL listing the forks of the repository.

git_commits_url.description: The URL listing the Git commits in the repository.

git_refs_url.description: The URL listing the Git references (branches, tags, etc.) in the repository.

git_tags_url.description: The URL listing the Git tags in the repository.

git_url.description: The Git URL to clone the repository.

issue_comment_url.description: The URL for the issue comments in the repository.

issue_events_url.description: The URL listing the issue events in the repository.

issues_url.description: The URL listing the issues in the repository.

keys_url.description: The URL listing the deploy keys of the repository.

labels_url.description: The URL listing the labels for issues in the repository.

languages_url.description: The URL listing the programming languages used in the repository.

merges_url.description: The URL listing the merges in the repository.

milestones_url.description: The URL listing the milestones in the repository.

notifications_url.description: The URL for notifications related to the repository.

pulls_url.description: The URL listing the pull requests in the repository.

releases_url.description: The URL listing the releases in the repository.

ssh_url.description: The SSH URL to clone the repository.

stargazers_url.description: The URL listing the stargazers of the repository.

statuses_url.description: The URL listing the commit statuses in the repository.

subscribers_url.description: The URL listing the subscribers to the repository.

subscription_url.description: The URL for managing the subscription to the repository.

tags_url.description: The URL listing the tags in the repository.

teams_url.description: The URL listing the teams associated with the repository.

trees_url.description: The URL listing the Git trees in the repository.

clone_url.description: The URL to clone the repository via HTTPS.

mirror_url.description: The URL of the repository's mirror.

hooks_url.description: The URL listing the webhooks in the repository.

svn_url.description: The SVN URL to checkout the repository.

homepage.description: The URL of the repository's homepage.

language.description: The primary programming language used in the repository.

forks_count.description: The number of times this repository has been forked.

stargazers_count.description: The number of stars this repository has received.

watchers_count.description: The number of users watching the repository.

size.description: The size of the repository in kilobytes.

default_branch.description: The default branch of the repository.

open_issues_count.description: The count of open issues in the repository.

is_template.description: Indicates whether the repository is a template repository.

topics.description: A list of topics (keywords) associated with the repository.

license.description: An object containing details about the repository's license.

key.description: The key identifier of the license.

url.description: The URL to the license content.

spdx_id.description: The SPDX identifier of the license.

node_id.description: The node-specific identifier for the license.

html_url.description: The URL of the license on GitHub's web interface.

has_issues.description: Indicates whether the repository has issues enabled.

has_projects.description: Indicates whether the repository has projects enabled.

has_wiki.description: Indicates whether the repository has a wiki enabled.

has_pages.description: Indicates whether the repository has GitHub Pages enabled.

has_downloads.description: Indicates whether the repository has downloads enabled.

archived.description: Indicates whether the repository is archived.

disabled.description: Indicates whether the repository is disabled.

visibility.description: The visibility of the repository (e.g., public, private).

pushed_at.description: The date and time when the last push was made to the repository.

created_at.description: The date and time when the repository was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update to the repository.

permissions.description: An object containing the repository's permission settings.

admin.description: Indicates whether the user has admin permissions.

push.description: Indicates whether the user has push permissions.

pull.description: Indicates whether the user has pull permissions.

maintain.description: Indicates whether the user has maintain permissions.

triage.description: Indicates whether the user has triage permissions.

allow_forking.description: Indicates whether forking is allowed for the repository.

forks.description: The number of forks of the repository.

has_discussions.description: Indicates whether the repository has discussions enabled.

open_issues.description: The count of open issues in the repository.

organization.description: The name of the organization to which the repository belongs, if any.

watchers.description: The number of watchers following the repository.

web_commit_signoff_required.description: Indicates whether commit signoff is required for the repository.

security_and_analysis.description: An object containing security and analysis features of the repository.

secret_scanning.description: An object containing details about the secret scanning feature.

status.description: The status of secret scanning feature in the repository.

secret_scanning_push_protection.description: An object containing details about the secret scanning push protection feature.

status.description: The status of the secret scanning push protection feature.
